title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.02 - City of Saratoga Springs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.02 - City of Saratoga Springs

State Regulations
(a) Excelsior Avenue. Excelsior Avenue between Veterans Way and Maple Avenue

South. (b) Marion Avenue. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Marion Avenue between Excelsior Avenue
and Route 50. (c) [Repealed]
(d) CR 44. The
northbound and southbound roadways of CR 44 between the northerly limit of CR
44 and CR 43. (e) CR 43. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of CR 43 between CR 44 and Route 50. (f) Route 50. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 50 between CR 43 and Adelphi Street. (g) Adelphi Street. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Adelphi Street between Route 50 and US Route 9. (h) Van Dam Street. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Van Dam Street between Route 50 and Church

Street. (i) Maple Avenue South. Maple Avenue South between Excelsior Avenue and Putnam Street. (j) [Eff. until March 9, 1994, see also
subd. (j) below.] Putnam Street. Putnam Street between Maple Avenue South and Spring Street. (j) [Eff. March 9, 1994, see also subd. (j) above.] West Avenue. West

Avenue between Route 29 and Route 9N (Church Street) only for special dimension
vehicles with actual terminal destinations or origins in Fulton County or on
segments of Route 29 in Saratoga County, exclusive of vehicle combinations
containing a trailer or semi-trailer in execess of 48 feet in length. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8141.02

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
